content: While looking at #31278, I noticed that in the file on partitions of unity we have some statements about ContDiff functions which are then duplicated to smooth versions just specializing the smoothness parameter to ∞. I thought we had dropped this duplication some time ago in mathlib because it was mostly noise. @Michael Rothgang , do you know if this duplication is an accidental outcome of the upstreaming from Sphere Eversion, or if it's there on purpose for some good reason?

I don't think this duplication is deliberate --- being an incidental outcome from upstreaming seems plausible. (Many lemmas there are still named using smooth, because nobody renamed them yet. PRs doing so are welcome :-))
